summary: WHILE DRIVING AT 30 MPH ACROSS SOME RAILROAD TRACKS, CONSUMER STATES" THE VEHICLE HAD A TIRE BLOW OUT ON THE PASSENGER FRONT.   ALL 4 TIRES HAVE NEEDED REPLACING UNDER 11,000 MILES.  MANUFACTURER OF TIRE SAYS THE TIRES  CAN'T BE UPGRADED, AND NO OTHER TIRE MANUFACTURER MAKES THIS TIRE.  MICHILAN MX 4  P21560R17 DOTB9KX DVMX2500.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.TS
